      • key

        @SafeVarargs
public final TableBuilder key(String... columns)
        Set key columns.

        Values for the key columns are used to uniquely identify database rows, e.g., they can be set to the columns that define the table's primary key. The key columns are used by key-based operations like JDBDT.delete(DataSet) and JDBDT.update(DataSet).

        Parameters:
        columns - Columns for the table.
        Returns:
        The builder instance for chained calls.

      • build

        public Table build(DB db)
        Build the table object.
        Parameters:
        db - Database.
        Returns:
        A new Table instance.
